participant_1.background:
I like to go to karaoke with my friends and sing songs from my childhood.
I would brag about my ability to find peace and tranquility in nature.
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.
i work in marketing.
i like football.

I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
my girl friend lives in the condo next door.
I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I enjoy spending time with my family as they help me stay grounded and connected to my roots.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Hey there! I am currently working on my costume for a cosplay contest!
Oh nice! What character are you going to be?
I am going to be Harley Quinn!
Oh wow! That's a great choice! I love Harley Quinn.
Thanks! I am pretty excited about it.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I like to play video games, watch anime, and read comics.
Oh cool! I love video games too. What are some of your favorite games?
I love the Legend of Zelda series, Pokemon, and Mario.
Nice! I love the Zelda series too! What is your favorite Zelda game?
My favorite is Ocarina of Time!
That's a great choice! It's one of my favorites too.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to rock and alternative.
Oh cool! I like rock and alternative too.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like the Killers, Twenty One Pilots, and Green Day.
Nice! I like the Killers and Twenty One Pilots too.
Oh cool! We should trade music sometime.
That would be cool! I would love to hear some new music.
Great! I will send you some links later.
Awesome! I look forward to it.
